pages.text: $(l)$(#734608)The$() $(l)$(item)Soulfire Chassis$(), $(l)$(#734608)a cage of wrought iron around a magic-infused flame, is used to conjure mysterious beings to this world.$()$()

$(l)$(#734608)The$() $(l)$(item)Soulfire Chassis$() $(l)$(#734608)doesn't do much on its own, but is empowered when placed in the center of specific structures. Anything summoned this way tends to be fickle. $(#ff0000)The design of the summoning structure needs to be completely accurate$()$(l)$(#734608) or nothing will happen. Note: don't breathe in the soulfire smoke. $()$()
